pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Utility to test color capabilities of terminal. It automatically detects 8, 16, 88, 256 color capabilities (via ncurses) and displays the appropriate color charts. It can display the colors as blocks or (2d) cubes optionally with color values overlaid in int or hex values. It can show the full rgb text string as well. It can also show the display with a vertical (default) or horizontal orientation or have additional padding.
